name: Disable Wp Updates & Notifications
author: Abhay Yadav

sections.description:
This plugin disables the themes, plugins and wordpress core updates.

This plugin include these three plugins

  • Disable or check WordPress Theme Update.
  • Disable or check WordPress Plugin Update.
  • Disable or check WordPress Core Update.

If you use this plugin, Check updates simply by deactivating this plugin for a short time.

Features

  • easy to install
  • No need to settings in admin.

Requirements

This plugin requires PHP 5 or PHP 7 and WordPress 3.0 or greater. It works in standard WordPress environments. It is strongly recommended to use WordPress in the newest version.

Contact

  • If you have any suggestion, feel free to email me at abhayrajmca@gmail.com.

How to Work

need to activate the plugin.

How to Use

only need to activate the plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins > Add New or Download the plugin and unzip it.
  2. Searh “Disable Wp Updates & Notifications” or Upload the folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. install and activate the WordPress admin panel.

After activating this plugin all themes, core and plugin update checkings are disabled. If you want to check new versions are existing, simply deactive this plugin.
sections.faq:
• If you have any suggestion, feel free to email me at abhayrajmca@gmail.com.
